summary: A warrior seeks his true origins in a seemingly prehistoric wasteland.
cast: Reb Brown|Corinne Cléry|John Steiner|Carole André|Luciano Pigozzi|Ayshe Gul|Aytekin Akkaya|Luigina Rocchi|Sergio Nicolai|Ludovico Della Jojo|Adrian Akdemir|Herent Akdemir|Ali Selgur|Zeynep Selgur|Henk Akin|Zenne Poksuz|Nurdan Asar|Yadigar Ejder|Nilgün Bubikoglu|Tevfik Sen|Yasemin Celenk|Levent Çakir|Paul Costello|Nello Pazzafini
director: Director: Antonio Margheriti (as Anthony M. Dawson)
title: Yor, el cazador que vino del futuro
